Coding

Sharing my solutions that I post on my GitHub to the LeetCode and HackerRank problems. If you find it helps, please do not hesitate to give me a STAR!
They might not be the best answers, however, they should be explainable for your interview.

2021.02.13 —  Irregular but continuing update, please keep following.
2021.02.18 —  Add one more section for HackerRank problem-solving.

LeetCode

Easy

  • 9. Palindrome Number — Runtime 40 ms (93.69%)  |  Mem Usage 13.2 MB (90.79%)  |  Github

  • 14. Longest Common Prefix — Runtime 16 ms (94.87%)  |  Mem Usage 13.7 MB (39.95%)  |  Github

  • 20. Valid Parentheses — Runtime 8 ms (99.73%)  |  Mem Usage 13.6 MB (37.70%)  |  Github

  • 104. Maximum Depth of Binary Tree — Runtime 24 ms (95.24%)  |  Mem Usage 15.9 MB (92.41%)  |  Github

Medium

  • 3. Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters — Runtime 36 ms (95.77%)  |  Mem Usage 13.7 MB (73.48%)  |  Github

  • 11. Container With Most Water — Runtime 116 ms (99.87%)  |  Mem Usage 15.4 MB (43.03%)  |  Github

  • 15. 3Sum — Runtime 528 ms (96.39%)  |  Mem Usage 16.9 MB (38.27%)  |  Github

  • 80. Remove Duplicates from Sorted Array II — Runtime 28 ms (99.63%)  |  Mem Usage 13.3 MB (97.40%)  |  Github

  • 208. Implement Trie (Prefix Tree) — Runtime 112 ms (99.40%)  |  Mem Usage 29.6 MB (93.89%)  |  Github

Hard

  • 4. Median of Two Sorted Arrays — Runtime 68 ms (88.56%)  |  Mem Usage 13.6 MB (79.10%)  |  Github

  • 72. Edit Distance — Runtime 88 ms (98.31%)  |  Mem Usage 16.6 MB (84.05%)  |  Github

This is a preview of Clap Button, a new feedback and analytics tools for Hydejack, built by yours truly. You can try it out on localhost for free, but it will be removed (together with this message) when building with JEKYLL_ENV=production. To use Clap Button on your site, get a subscription
and set clap_button: true in your config file.
